${ModID}:StrikeOfMidnight.NAME: Strike of Midnight
${ModID}:StrikeOfMidnight.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 生成 1 Dark。

${ModID}:StrikeOfLuck.NAME: Strike of Luck
${ModID}:StrikeOfLuck.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害 to a random enemy 1 to 3 次。

${ModID}:LightningStrike.NAME: Lightning Strike
${ModID}:LightningStrike.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL 生成 1 Lightning。

${ModID}:PenaltyStrike.NAME: Penalty Strike
${ModID}:PenaltyStrike.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 目标失去 !M! 点 力量 。 NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:Backstrike.NAME: Backstrike
${ModID}:Backstrike.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL ${ModID}:修改 all Attacks in hand: "Name 获得s Strike."

${ModID}:WorkersStrike.NAME: Worker's Strike
${ModID}:WorkersStrike.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 抽 an Attack. If it is a Strike, 获得 [E]。

${ModID}:StrikeDummyJr.NAME: Strike Dummy Jr。
${ModID}:StrikeDummyJr.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !M! 点 力量 。 NL Strikes deal 2 more damage 本场战斗。

${ModID}:DifferentStrikes.NAME: Different Strikes
${ModID}:DifferentStrikes.DESCRIPTION: 消耗 all 牌 in hand. Replace them with random Strikes that cost 1 less。 NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:StrikeOfGenius.NAME: Strike of Genius
${ModID}:StrikeOfGenius.DESCRIPTION: 你的回合开始时， 获得 a random "Strike". NL It costs 0 until played 并获得s 消耗 。
${ModID}:StrikeOfGenius.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 你的回合开始时， 获得 a random Upgraded "Strike". NL It costs 0 until played 并获得s 消耗 。

${ModID}:StrikeABar获得.NAME: Strike a Bar获得
${ModID}:StrikeABar获得.DESCRIPTION: Your Attacks costs 0 本回合. You cannot play non-Attacks 本回合。
